data.eml:eml: A new ant genus from southern Argentina and southern Chile, Patagonomyrmex (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Johnson, Robert A., Moreau, Corrie S. (2016): A new ant genus from southern Argentina and southern Chile, Patagonomyrmex (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Zootaxa 4139 (1): 1-31, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4139.1.1
